Definition: In this task, you are shown a conversation between a user and system. Based on the conversation, you need to identify who has spoken the indicated sentence.

Sentence3: Any sort of food would be fine, as long as it is a bit expensive. Could I get the phone number for your recommendation?Question: Who has spoken the sentence 2? (A) User (B) System
